name: Last Man (Beta Version)
description:
Mission 3 Gamelay:

Some organizations have created a horrible virus, to benefit ... The SWAT team must find the components and follow the plan to end this apocalypse, you will combats against mutants and horrible zombies, will have to find many things to end with this apocalypses and kill many zombies! play with your friends or alone and try to survive until the final #MadeWithUnity

if you want know more, visit and give us like in our facebook page: https://web.facebook.com/ColVenGames/?ref=settings

Let us your comments about the game to improve it :)
